import { useState } from 'react' import './ManageQuiz.scss' import Select from 'react-select' const options = [] const ManageQuiz = (props) => { const [name,setName] = useState(''); const [description,setDescription] = useState(''); const [type,setType] = useState('EASY'); const [image,setImage] = useState(null); const handleChangeFile = (Event) => { if (Event && Event.target && Event.target.files[0]) { setImage(Event.target.files[0]) } return (
Manage Quizzes
Add new quiz:
setName(Event.target.value)}/>
setName(Event.target.description)}/>
handleChangeFile(Event)}>
) } } export default ManageQuiz
